content: Somewhere in the fuzzy corners of my mind I thought there was a special syntax for dicts/hashmaps in Roc, but I'm not having a lot of luck with searching. Is that a thing? What is it?
it was a part of the design at one point, but it's not currently implemented
I'm not 100% sure it's the right design either, for what it's worth :sweat_smile:
that's fine! I'm just writing up some pretend code samples and I wanted to use the right syntax if it was available. I'll just pretend that Dict.fromList or something exists for now
